HVR 25 E HVR 50 SE HVR 10 NE LWT 20 S LWT 3HT 20 NNE BZN 20 E BTM
3DU 60 N 3DU 40 SSW CTB 40 NW CTB.

THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 65 NW
GGW GGW 30 SW OLF 30 WSW GDV 35 SW BHK 40 WSW 2WX 35 NW RAP 30 W CDR
10 SSW BFF 15 NW AKO 25 WSW ITR LAA 30 NNW LBL 40 SE DDC 30 SW ICT
25 SSE EMP 45 NNE CNU 30 N JLN JLN 20 S GMJ 25 NNE MKO CQB 30 WNW

WNW COS 35 SSE LAR 55 SSE CPR 40 WNW CPR 50 NNW RIW 50 SSW COD 50
SSW COD 40 NNE JAC 35 SE SMN 55 WNW SMN P69 45 W GPI 85 NNW GPI.

20 SE DVL 55 E N60 20 SE DIK 25 NE RAP 35 SE CDR 35 ESE AIA 40 NW
